## DurableContext.wait() method

Pauses execution for the specified duration

**Signature:**

```typescript
wait(duration: Duration): DurablePromise<void>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

duration

</td><td>

[Duration](./durable-execution-sdk-js.duration.md)

</td><td>

Duration to wait

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[DurablePromise](./durable-execution-sdk-js.durablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;void&gt;

## Example

```typescript
// Wait 30 seconds for rate limiting
await context.wait({ seconds: 30 });

// Wait using multiple units
await context.wait({ hours: 1, minutes: 30 });
```
